meanings.definition: To treat with disdain or contempt.
meanings.sent1: She snubbest her classmate by refusing to talk to him.
meanings.sent2: He always snubbests people who disagree with him.
meanings.sent3: The cat snubbested the new toy, preferring the old one instead.
meanings.sent4: The snobbish queen snubbested the humble villagers, looking down on them.
meanings.sent5: The bully's snubbing behavior made him unpopular among his peers.

meanings.definition: To ignore or reject someone in a rude or dismissive manner.
meanings.sent1: When she saw him approaching, she snubbest him and walked away.
meanings.sent2: He tends to snubbest anyone who doesn't meet his standards.
meanings.sent3: The snubbing waiter pretended not to see the customer waving for attention.
meanings.sent4: Her cold shoulder was a clear way of snubbing his invitation.
meanings.sent5: The celebrity's assistant snubbested the eager fans waiting for autographs.
